docs.snippet: The United States has offered to send a special envoy to North Korea to win the release of a jailed missionary, but signaled that any meaningful talks with Pyongyang will require it to give up its pursuit of nuclear weapons....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States has offered to send a special envoy to North Korea to win the release of a jailed missionary, but signaled that any meaningful talks with Pyongyang will require it to give up its pursuit of nuclear weapons.

headline.main: U.S. Offers to Send Envoy to North Korea to Free Jailed Missionary
headline.print_headline: U.S. Offers to Send Envoy to North Korea to Free Jailed Missionary
